reviewText: What can I say, sad, beautiful, amazing. The soundtrack is by Tito Larriva, from the Plugz, who did the Repo Man soundtrack. Not a happy ending, but uplifting in some paradoxical way. Feels like Twin Peaks on half a bottle of Nyquil. I wish I could buy the soundtrack album. See this, then see Amanda Plummer in "Freejack". The Lord helps them who helps themselves.
